tool_description: API search user, get user profile, user pins
title: Pinterest APIs

api_list.name: Search User

schema.title: Response Search Keyword V1 Pinterest Search Get

api_list.name: Get User Profile
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pinterest-apis.p.rapidapi.com/v1/pinterest/profile/{username}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pinterest-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get User Pins
api_list.description: Get User Pins by user name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pinterest-apis.p.rapidapi.com/v1/pinterest/user/{username}/pins"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pinterest-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

schema.title: Response Get User Pins V1 Pinterest User  Username  Pins Get
